attributes.action: Stop Brexit immediately and revoke article 50. Also call general elections.
attributes.additional_details: Brexit as concept violates several of British and global laws from racism acts to human laws acts. It supports itself in a non elected government and prime minister hated by most of the British society. Forces 2 of the 4 countries of the union to be part of a coup that nobody wants. It should be stoped and NOW!!!
attributes.background: Brexit referendum was held and supported in several lyes and a corrupt and misleading campaign that has in its roots only the profound hate of a small part of British society by all Europeans living and working in the country. Brexit as a concept violates several British laws and should be stoped.
